# docker_access_token (Resource)

Manages Docker Hub Personal Access Tokens (PATs).



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `label` (String) A label/description for the access token.

### Optional

- `is_active` (Boolean) Whether the token is active. Default: true.
- `scopes` (List of String) List of scopes/permissions for the token. Valid values: repo:read, repo:write, repo:admin, repo:public_read.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource (same as uuid).
- `token` (String, Sensitive) The access token value. Only available at creation time.
- `uuid` (String) The UUID of the access token.
